original_text: And as Peter was below in the courtyard, one of the servant girls of the high priest came,
korean_text: 베드로는 아랫뜰에 있더니 대제사장의 여종 하나가 와서

sentences.original_text: And as Peter was below in the courtyard,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베드로가 아래 뜰에 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: one of the servant girls of the high priest came,
